items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dress!!
items.body: When I first pulled it out of the packaging I was skeptical. The material didn't feel bad but it felt strange. But boy! When I put this dress on I fell in love with it!! So beautiful and fit right in all the places. Great price for the quality of the dress. Unfortunately I didn't get any pictures of me in the dress but I would have been down for a photo shoot! That's how amazing I felt in the dress! I'm 5'3" and 130 pounds and the small was perfect. If your trying to decide between two dresses....pick this one! Read more
items.author: Zoey Abel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, versatile dress or tunic! Order your normal (standard American) size.
items.body: I am so happy to have discovered this lovely dress. It fits my frame nicely and I feel good wearing it. It feels like better quality. I'm 5'6" and the length on me is just above the knee. The empire waist is flattering for us pear-shaped girls with an average-sized bust line. I can imagine that if you have gigantic b**bs! ðŸ˜‚, you might want to pass on this, because the empire cut and stretchy smocking across the chest will over-emphasize that area and kind of ruin the overall look, IMO. Also, the rounded neckline might be a bit cleavage-y for bigger girls. I love that this is so versatile and can be worn as a casual dress with flats or heels, or as a longer tunic top with leggings. The blousey, fuller sleeves with elastic at the wrists are comfortable and forgiving. And, surprise, the sleeves are even long enough on me! I love the fabric. It has a good weight and thickness and hangs nicely, but is still flowy, soft, and feminine. I'm glad it's not made of that typical, dreaded, butt-clingy T-shirt material or that equally dreaded thin, stretchy knit fabric (aka cheap, fast-fashion) that is so prevalent from clothing sellers. Note: The sizing is equivalent to standard American sizes, so if you typically size up for your Amazon clothing purchases, you won't need to do so for this. OK, now I'm going to order a few more colors! Read more
items.author: Kitty MM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress
items.body: Adorable dress. Fit is perfect and live the color. I wore it to church. But can wear anywhere. Material very well done. Lots of movement Read more
items.author: Robin Southern

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not for XL ladies but pretty and well made
items.body: I bought this dress for me. I wear an XL and let me just say that it could just be my body shape but it made me look 10x bigger! The dress itself it pretty and well made but in my opinion NOT for us who are fluffy! Read more
items.author: Daplumaschick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your New Go-To Casual Dress
items.body: This empire waist dress is absolutely adorable and fits perfectly when ordering your true size. It offers a flattering silhouette and effortless comfort, making it easy to dress up or down. Pair it with your favorite boots and a denim jacket for a stylish, on-the-go look thatâ€™s ready for a day out or a casual night on the town. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Chrissie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute, smells
items.body: Cute dress fits well. Only Issue is it smells so strong of perfume out of the bag. You could Smell it in the mailbox even coming from The dressz I have washed it twice and still only smell the very strong smell is there Read more
items.author: Jessie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and great with leggings.
items.body: I love this dress. I can dress it up with my thigh high boots and some leggings for winter warmth and style. I love the material also. Length is on the shorter side, but great with winter leggings. Color is just as shown. Not see through. I have got tons of compliments on this dress. I just may end up wearing it out, or no...I will just buy more in other colors! lol Read more
items.author: Water Doc

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy easy to wear, dress up or down
items.body: Bought this for my 23 yr old dtr . Cute loose style comfy washes easily without shrinking fading or wrinkles . breathable fabric , flattering style . I would get this in multiple colors if she wouldnâ€™t care that her mom is wearing the same style ! lol Read more
items.author: lisa higgins

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Mint Green, Sky Blue, Floral Red, Leopard Brown, Pink, Floral Blue, Apricot, Floral Yellow, Rose, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
